overview: David Lemley has more than 20 years experience in the software and hardware industries including experience in payments and security technologies. Prior to co-founding Tabbedout, David served as VP Technology and Chief Architect at MPOWER Labs and as Senior Development Manager of Core Detection Technologies at WholeSecurity and Symantec. While at WholeSecurity and Symantec, he created novel behavior blocking technology to combat keylogging and remote screen capture malware which is now deployed on the desktops of millions of Symantec customers. David earned a BSEET from Southern Polytechnic State University where he was a member of the Tau Alpha Pi national honor society.
